title: Minutes from DFW Airport, Assigned Parking
map_address: West Pioneer Dr near Esters Rd
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 716 Sq.
Welcome to Creekwood - the Apartment Community that offers quality as well as large variety of amenities, making each individual apartment a unique home.
As you approach Creekwood and pull into your individually assigned parking space, one look around tells you that the professional management and maintenance team have been busy.

The two multilevel swimming pools are clear and sparkling, the grounds are lush with landscaping and flowers in bloom, neighbors are walking on our fitness track that winds through the community, and you have the refreshing and satisfying sense that you are "home".
Now that you are home, why not spend some time breaking a sweat in our fitness facility?
Or perhaps something grilled for dinner at one of our strategically placed barbeque grills?
Or perhaps you just want to unwind in your spacious home watching a movie or reading that good book that you never seem to have the time for…..whatever your choice, Creekwood can accommodate.
Not just a home… it is a lifestyle.

Elegant Wood Burning Fireplaces, Built-in Bookcases, Bay Windows, Full Size Wahser/Dryer Connections*, Ceiling Fans, Outside Storage, Private Fenced Patios or Balconies*, Faux Wood Blinds, Dry Bar, Frost-Free Refrigerator with Ice Maker

Less than 20 mins from Arlington Ball Stadiums and Parks, Laundry Facilities, Lush Landscaping, Less than 2 miles from George Bush Tollway, BBQ Grill, Minutes from DFW Airport, Two Sparkling Pools, Less than 2 miles from Highways, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, Convenient Location to Malls and Dining, Large Clubroom, Assigned Parking, Jogging trail, 183 and 360
No Aggressive breeds restrictions do apply.
